categoriesExplanation: The workout video is clearly categorized as a Treadmill workout, as indicated by the video title "BEST BEGINNER Tread Workout for 15 MINUTES," the tags such as "treadmill workout," "follow along running workout," and "treadmill running routine," and frequent mentions of treadmills in the description and comments. This results in a high confidence level of 0.9 for the Treadmill category. Secondly, the video tag "15 minute hiit run" and the description mention "15:00 minutes of run and recovery intervals," suggesting a High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) format. Although the HIIT term appears less prominently than Treadmill, it still merits consideration with a score of 0.6, reflecting the interval nature of the workout. The presence of interval running and user comments about the workout being "beginner-friendly" support this classification. The channel's focus on running and a community of runners further strengthens the treadmill-centered categorization.
